room_title: Escape room "The Train Heist Adventure" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a good time! The Train Heist room was both fun and challenging. Highly recommend 👍🏽

room_title: Escape room "The Train Heist Adventure" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Loved the Great Train Heist! Super fun and lots of puzzles to get through. Teens had a great time as well as Moms! Great character actors, plus nice hints (if you need them).Thank you for a fun afternoon!

room_title: Escape room "The Train Heist Adventure" by The Secret Chambers in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We had a fantastic time solving the train heist! These escape rooms are incredibly detailed and well designed in terms of puzzles, props, and scenarios. The facility is clean and well maintained, and the staff are delightful. I can not recommend The Secret Chambers highly enough!
